Layer.onMultiTouch

Function/Meaning
Multi-touch state changed
Type
Layer class event
Syntax
onMultiTouch()
Arguments
None
Description
Occurs when a multi-touch state starts, moves, or ends.
Coordinate information can be obtained via the Window.touchPointCount property and the Window.getTouchPoint method.
This event occurs on the layer that has focus.
Reference
Window.getTouchPoint
Window.touchPointCount
